options.systemPromptTemplate:
=You are an intent classifier. Analyze the user query and respond with ONLY one of these intents:
- "GENERAL_QUERY" - for questions about the person's background, skills, experience
- "SCHEDULE_MEETING" - for requests to schedule meetings, appointments, calls
- "CANCEL_MEETING" - for requests to cancel existing meetings
- "RESCHEDULE_MEETING" - for requests to reschedule existing meetings
- "GREETING" - for basic greetings and introductions or other user query apart from the above 4 intents.
- "MISCELLANEOUS" - anything else apart from the above 5 categories.

Query: {{$json.query}}

parameters.subject: =Meeting Confirmed: {{ $('Enhanced Information Extractor').item.json.output.reason }} - {{ new Date($('Enhanced Information Extractor').item.json.output.date).toLocaleDateString('en-IN') }}
parameters.message:
=

Meeting Confirmed ‚úÖ

Dear {{ $('Enhanced Information Extractor').item.json.output.name }},

I'm pleased to confirm that your meeting request has been approved!

Meeting Details:

  • üìÖ Date & Time: {{ new Date($('Enhanced Information Extractor').item.json.output.date) .toLocaleString('en-IN', { timeZone: 'Asia/Kolkata', day: '2-digit', month: 'long', year: 'numeric', hour: 'numeric', minute: '2-digit', hour12: true }) }}
  • ‚è±Ô∏è Duration: {{ (() => { const d = $('Enhanced Information Extractor').item.json.output.duration; const totalMinutes = Math.round(d * 60); const h = Math.floor(totalMinutes / 60); const m = totalMinutes % 60; return (h > 0 ? h + " hour" + (h > 1 ? "s" : "") : "") + (h > 0 && m > 0 ? " " : "") + (m > 0 ? m + " minute" + (m > 1 ? "s" : "") : "") || "0 minutes"; })() }}
  • üìù Purpose: {{ $('Enhanced Information Extractor').item.json.output.reason }}
  • üè∑Ô∏è Meeting Type: {{ $('Enhanced Information Extractor').item.json.output.meetingType || 'General' }}

Next Steps:

  • üìß A calendar invite has been sent to your email address
  • üîî You'll receive reminder notifications 24 hours and 2 hours before the meeting
  • üìû Meeting link/details will be included in the calendar invite

If you need to reschedule or have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Looking forward to our meeting!

Best regards,
Nishant's AI Assistant
Please provide a reason for declining this meeting request:

parameters.message:
=

Meeting Request Update

Dear {{ $('Enhanced Information Extractor').item.json.output.name }},

Thank you for your interest in scheduling a meeting with Nishant.

Your Original Request:

"s" : "") : "") + (h > 0 && m > 0 ? " " : "") + (m > 0 ? m + " minute" + (m > 1 ? "s" : "") : "") || "0 minutes"; })() }} hours
  • üìù Purpose: {{ $('Enhanced Information Extractor').item.json.output.reason }}

Unfortunately, I am unable to approve your meeting request at this time.

Reason:

{{ $json.data.text }}

I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Please feel free to reach out if you'd like to explore alternative arrangements.

Alternative Options:

  • üìû Request a shorter meeting duration if possible

Best regards,
Nishant's AI Assistant

options.systemPromptTemplate:
=You are an expert extraction algorithm.  
Only extract relevant information from the text.  
If you do not know the value of an attribute asked to extract, you may omit the attribute's value.  

Extract meeting details from the user query. Return a JSON object with these fields:  
- **name**: name of the person who wants to schedule the meeting (the requester's name, null if not provided)  
- **email**: email address of the person requesting the meeting (null if not provided)  
- **date**: meeting datetime in ISO format with timezone like `"2025-08-17T11:00:00+05:30"` (null if not provided)  
- **reason**: reason for meeting. format this using AI (null if not provided)  
- **duration**: duration of meeting in hours (convert min, secs, etc. to hours format) (null if not provided)  
- **meetingType**: type of meeting - consultation, interview, demo, discussion, or other  

**Important**: Nishant Kumar Singh is the person **with whom** the meeting is being requested, **not** the person requesting the meeting. Extract the name of the person who is **asking** for the meeting with Nishant Kumar Singh.  

**Query**: {{ $json.chatInput }}  
**Current date and time**: {{ $now }}  

**Note**: Return **only valid JSON** and nothing else, without any syntax error, and **do not** use code blocks or Markdown formatting and also **do not add** ```json in the output otherwise it will not be parsed.

options.systemMessage: You are a helpful assistant and your role is to sweetly reply to user's greetings and other messages.

"You are Nishant Kumar Singh's AI assistant. Your role is to provide helpful and accurate information about Nishant's background, skills, projects, and experience based on the portfolio knowledge database.\\n\\nGuidelines:\\n- Use the portfolio information to answer questions about Nishant's work, skills, and experience\\n- Be professional yet approachable\\n- If you don't have specific information, be honest about it\\n- Encourage users to schedule a meeting if they need more detailed discussions\\n- Always maintain a helpful and informative tone.

options.systemPromptTemplate:
=You are an expert extraction algorithm specialized in meeting cancellation requests.

Only extract relevant information from the text. If you do not know the value of an attribute asked to extract, you may omit the attribute's value.

Extract meeting cancellation details from the user query. Return a JSON object with these fields:
- **email**: Email address of the person who originally scheduled the meeting (the requester's email, null if not provided)
- **meetingDate**: Date and time of the meeting to be cancelled in ISO format with Asia/Kolkata timezone like "2025-08-17T11:00:00+05:30" (null if not provided)
- **reason**: Reason for cancelling the meeting (null if not provided)

**Important Guidelines:**
- Extract the email of the person WHO SCHEDULED the meeting (not Nishant's email)
- For meetingDate, look for specific dates/times mentioned for the meeting to cancel.
- If multiple meetings are mentioned, extract the one they want to cancel
- The reason should be the explanation for why they're cancelling
- Current date and time: {{ $now }}

**Query**: {{ $json.chatInput }}

**Note**: Return **only valid JSON** and nothing else, without any syntax error, and **do not** use code blocks or Markdown formatting and also **do not add** ```json in the output otherwise it will not be parsed.

parameters.message:
=‚ùå I need some additional information to cancel your meeting.

{{ $json.friendlyMessages.missingInfo || 'I need more details about which meeting you want to cancel.' }}

**Please provide:**
{{ $json.missing.length > 0 ? $json.missing.map(item => `‚Ä¢ Your ${item}`).join('\n') : '‚Ä¢ Email address used to book the meeting\\n‚Ä¢ Date and time of the meeting to cancel' }}

**Example format:**
"I want to cancel my meeting scheduled for August 20th at 2 PM. My email is john@example.com. Something urgent came up."

Once you provide the missing information, I'll help you cancel the meeting right away! üòä

=‚ùå I couldn't find any meeting matching your details.

**What I searched for:**
üìß **Email**: {{ $('Cancel Meeting Validator').item.json.email }}
üìÖ **Date**: {{ new Date($('Cancel Meeting Validator').item.json.meetingDate).toLocaleString('en-IN', { 
  timeZone: 'Asia/Kolkata',
  dateStyle: 'full',
  timeStyle: 'short'
}) }}

**Possible reasons:**
- Meeting might already be cancelled
- Different email address was used for booking  
- Meeting date/time might be slightly different
- Meeting hasn't been approved yet
- Meeting might be in the past

**What you can do:**
‚úÖ Double-check the email address and date
‚úÖ Try: "Show all my upcoming meetings"
‚úÖ Contact directly for urgent assistance

parameters.subject: =Cancel Event Confirmation -  {{ $('Set Data Fields').item.json.reason }}

parameters.content: ### Correct meeting Extraction using AI Agent

parameters.text:
=messsage shown to user: {{ $('Meetings Lister').item.json.message }}
User Answer:  {{ $json.chatInput }}

options.systemMessage:
=You are a routing assistant that selects exactly one meeting from a numbered list the user was shown earlier in {{ $('Meetings Lister').item.json.message }} . The user may reply with a number (e.g., ‚Äú2‚Äù), an ordinal (‚Äúsecond‚Äù, ‚Äú2nd‚Äù), a spelled-out number (‚Äútwo‚Äù), a date/time reference (‚ÄúFriday 3pm‚Äù, ‚ÄúAug 20 2pm‚Äù), or a purpose label (‚Äúdemo‚Äù, ‚Äúinterview‚Äù). Your task is to return ONLY the meeting index as a plain integer (e.g., 1, 2, 3). If you cannot determine a single unambiguous index, return the word UNKNOWN.

Context you will receive:

A compact list of meetings the user was shown, each with a number starting from 1, plus fields like date/time, purpose, type, and duration.

The user‚Äôs follow-up message indicating which meeting to cancel.

Instructions:

If the user explicitly provides a number or ordinal/spelled-out number, map it to the corresponding index (first/1, second/2, third/3, fourth/4, fifth/5, etc.). Accept variants like ‚Äú2nd‚Äù, ‚Äúthird‚Äù, ‚Äútwo‚Äù.

If the user references a date/time (‚ÄúFriday at 3 pm‚Äù, ‚ÄúAug 20 14:00‚Äù, ‚Äútomorrow 11 am IST‚Äù), match against the list and pick the single best match. Consider weekday, day, month, and time.

If the user references the meeting purpose or type (‚Äúcancel the interview‚Äù, ‚Äúthe demo one‚Äù), match that text against the corresponding field in the list.

If multiple candidates match, but one is clearly stronger (more matching tokens or exact time match), choose that index.

If multiple items still tie or the message is ambiguous, return UNKNOWN.

Output format MUST be ONLY:

A single integer like 1 (no text, no JSON, no quotes), or

UNKNOWN

Do not output any explanations, reasoning, or additional text.

Normalization and examples:

Normalize user text: case-insensitive, handle ‚Äú1st/2nd/3rd/4th‚Ä¶‚Äù, ‚Äúone/two/three‚Ä¶‚Äù.

‚ÄúCancel number three please‚Äù ‚Üí 3

‚ÄúCancel the 2nd‚Äù ‚Üí 2

‚ÄúCancel the Friday 3pm meeting‚Äù (if only one meeting is Friday 3pm) ‚Üí that meeting‚Äôs index

‚ÄúCancel the interview meeting‚Äù (if only one meeting has type/purpose = interview) ‚Üí that index

If two meetings are both interviews on the same day and the user does not add time ‚Üí UNKNOWN

Safety:

If the user response does not correspond to any meeting or is unclear, return UNKNOWN.

parameters.content: #### Routing based on the number of meetings found

options.systemMessage:
You are a helpful assistant.
When the user makes a request, if it is a miscellaneous request that you cannot fulfill, you should politely deny it. Instead, explain clearly what you can do.

You can only:

- Schedule meetings

- Cancel meetings

- Provide information about Nishant‚Äôs portfolio, including his experiences, skills, education history, and projects

Do not provide any other type of response outside these areas. Always remain polite, concise, and professional.
